short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically shorten your links as you copy them!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of having to open bitly to shorten your URLs? With this extension, shorten your URLs right when you copy them!

Made with <3 by Michael Zhang for CodeDay 2014.

#hellyeah

How to use

- Select a link, copy it, and it will automatically become shortened!
- Right click a link, select "Copy and shorten link...", and it will automatically become shortened!
- Open the options page for this extension for history.
